config_description: Throttles all streaming file transfer between the datacenters, this setting allows users to throttle inter dc stream throughput in addition to throttling all network stream traffic as configured with
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'stream_throughput_outbound_megabits_per_sec' is used to set the outbound stream throughput in megabits per second. It is used to throttle all streaming file transfer between datacenters.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the 'setStreamThroughputMbPerSec' method is called to set a new value for the outbound stream throughput.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the configuration option is that it controls the rate at which streaming file transfers occur between datacenters. Setting a lower value will throttle the throughput, potentially reducing network congestion and improving overall system performance.
